changeNameDescription: Enter a new name for this participant.
changeNameInfo: This will not affect any votes you have already made.
deleteParticipantDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this participant? This action cannot be undone.
deletePollDescription: All data related to this poll will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
deletingOptionsWarning: You are deleting options that participants have voted for. Their votes will also be deleted.
descriptionPlaceholder: Hey everyone, please choose the dates that work for you!
mixedOptionsDescription: You can't have both time and date options in the same poll. Which would you like to keep?
name: Name
newParticipantFormDescription: Fill in the form below to submit your votes.
noVotes: No one has voted for this option
specifyTimesDescription: Include start and end times for each option
title: Title
userAlreadyExists: A user with that email already exists
userNotFound: A user with that email doesn't exist
verificationCodeHelp: Didn't get the email? Check your spam/junk.
verificationCodeSent: A verification code has been sent to {email} Change
wrongVerificationCode: Your verification code is incorrect or has expired
errors_notFoundDescription: We couldn't find the page you're looking for.
inviteParticipantsDescription: Copy and share this invite link to start gathering responses from your participants.
inviteParticipantLinkInfo: Anyone with this link will be able to vote on your poll.
guestPollAlertDescription: <0>Create an account</0> or <1>login</1> to claim this poll.
guestPollAlertTitle: Your administrator rights can be lost if you clear your cookies
permissionDeniedDescription: If you are the poll creator, please login to access your poll
editDetailsDescription: Change the details of your event.
finalizeDescription: Select a final date for your event.
notificationsGuestTooltip: Create an account or login to turn on notifications
dateAndTimeDescription: Change your preferred date and time settings
permissionDeniedParticipant: If you are not the poll creator, you should go to the Invite Page.
billingStatusDescription: Manage your subscription and billing details
noPollsDescription: Get started by creating a new poll.
describeYourEvent: Describe what your event is about
selectPotentialDates: Select potential dates or times for your event
calendarHelp: You can't create a poll without any options. Add at least one option to continue.
commentPlaceholder: Leave a comment on this poll (visible to everyone)
clockPreferencesDescription: Set your preferred time zone and time format.
duplicateDescription: Create a new poll based on this one
duplicateTitleDescription: Hint: Give your new poll a unique title
upgradeOverlaySubtitle2: Please upgrade to a paid plan to use this feature. This is how we keep the lights on :)
activeSubscription: Thank you for subscribing to Rallly Pro. You can manage your subscription and billing details from the billing portal.
supportBilling: Please reach out if you need any assistance.
pollsDeleted: Polls are automatically deleted once they become inactive
earlyAccess: Get early access to new features
earlyAdopterDescription: As an early adopter, you'll lock in your subscription rate and won't be affected by future price increases.
lockPrice: Upgrade today to keep this price forever.
features: Get access to all current and future Pro features!
pleaseUpgrade: Please upgrade to Pro to use this feature
pollSettingsDescription: Customize the behaviour of your poll
requireParticipantEmailLabel: Make email address required for participants
hideParticipantsLabel: Hide participant list from other participants
hideScoresLabel: Hide scores until after a participant has voted
authErrorDescription: There was an error logging you in. Please try again.
